'''Dadao''' is a [[Redbill Pelican]] that can be found in {{Location|Chenyu Vale: Upper Vale}}.

Interacting with Dadao for the first time gives the player [[Fish Seized From a Pelican's Mouth]]. It can be used on the food dish next to [[Daju]], which rewards an [[Exquisite Chest]].

==Dialogue==
===Dialogue Set #1===
''Available during the first interaction.''
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Dadao:''' *guttural grunts*
:{{DIcon}} What's that fish in your mouth?
:{{Black Screen|Hearing you question the origin of the fish, the thief becomes completely enraged.}}
:{{Black Screen|It spreads its wings and charges at you and Paimon, tussling and tangling with you both.}}
:{{Black Screen|After a difficult and grueling battle, you finally gain the upper hand.}}
:'''Dadao:''' !?
:{{DIcon}} Now you know who's boss!
;(Obtain {{Item|Fish Seized From a Pelican's Mouth|20|x=1}})
{{Dialogue End}}
